a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of democracies and autocracies, World
Political regimes based on the criteria of the classification by Lührmann et al. (2018) and the assessment by
Source: OWID based on Lührmann et al. (2018) and V-Dem (v12)
Note: The number of closed autocracies increases a lot in 1900 because V-Dem covers many more countries since then, often colonies.
